title: Jewish family to sue NYC for $100M after being allegedly pummeled in  antisemitic  brawl at 5th - grade graduation
message:
Jewish family to sue NYC for $100M after being allegedly pummeled in ‘antisemitic’ brawl at 5th-grade graduationA Jewish family who was allegedly pummeled in an antisemitic attack at a fifth-grade public-school graduation in Brooklyn is planning to sue the city for $100 million, The Post has learned.
Johan Nunez and Lana Lerner are planning to sue the city for $100 million after an antisemitic attack at a fifth grade graduation in Brooklyn.
“The administrator basically told her that ‘we contacted legal and were told it’s free speech and it’s allowed,’” Lerner said.
“They were pushing my mother out of the way,” Lerner told The Post, “She turned to them and said, ‘Excuse me, please stop pushing.
Multiple people joined in on the fracas, including a woman who nailed Nunez with her black stiletto, the family said.
